anya-e0103n3:1_3: ‘‘Cittaṁ bhāvaya’’nti imameva desanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘atisaṅkhepadesitattā’’ti. Ko samādhīti sarūpapucchā.
anya-e0103n3:1_4: Kenaṭṭhena samādhīti kena atthena samādhīti vuccati,
anya-e0103n3:1_5: ‘‘samādhī’’ti padaṁ kaṁ abhidheyyatthaṁ nissāya pavattanti attho. Katividhoti pabhedapucchā.
anya-e0103n3:2_1: vibhāgavantānaṁ pana sarūpavibhāvanaṁ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo.
anya-e0103n3:2_2: Taṁdassane ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṁ ‘‘samādhi bahuvidho’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:2_5: Na sādheyyāti lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanā idha adhippetattho, tañca na sādheyya.
anya-e0103n3:2_6: Jhānavimokkhādīsu hi samādhiṁ uddharitvā tassa labbhamānehi vibhāgehi vissajjane kariyamāne jhānavibhaṅgādīsu (vibha.
anya-e0103n3:2_7: 508 ādayo) āgato sabbo samādhipabhedo vissajjetabbo siyā.
anya-e0103n3:2_8: Tathā ca sati yvāyaṁ lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanāvidhi adhippeto,
anya-e0103n3:2_10: Kiñca yenassa tikacatukkajhānikena hīnādibhedabhinnena pavattivibhāgena brahmapārisajjādivasena navavidho,
anya-e0103n3:2_11: pañcamajjhānikena vehapphalādivasena dasavidho vā ekādasavidho vā bhavappabhedo nippajjati.
anya-e0103n3:2_12: Svāssa pavattivibhāgo ayaṁ soti niddhāretvā vuccamāno vikkhepāya siyā, yathā taṁ avisaye.
anya-e0103n3:3_0: Cittacetasikānaṁ samaṁ avisāravasena sampiṇḍentassa viya ādhānaṁ samādhānaṁ. Avisāralakkhaṇo hi samādhi, sampiṇḍanaraso ca.
anya-e0103n3:3_2: Avikkhepalakkhaṇo vā hi samādhi, vikkhepaviddhaṁsanaraso cāti.
anya-e0103n3:3_5: Tathā hesa ‘‘cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī’’ti (dha. sa. 15) niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0103n3:3_7: Tathā hissa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ dīpacciṭṭhiti nidassitā. Ānubhāvenāti balena, paccayabhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:3_10: Etenassa vikkhepapaṭipakkhataṁ dasseti. Avippakiṇṇāti avisaṭā. Etena avisāralakkhaṇataṁ.
anya-e0103n3:4_1: sampayuttā vā na vikkhipanti etenāti avikkhepo,
anya-e0103n3:4_2: so lakkhaṇaṁ etassāti avikkhepalakkhaṇo. Vikkhepaṁ viddhaṁseti,
anya-e0103n3:5_2: na tenassa koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha ‘‘avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:5_3: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe appento viya pavattatīti vitakko appanā.
anya-e0103n3:5_4: Tathā hi so ‘‘appanā byappanā’’ti (dha. sa. 7) niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0103n3:5_5: Tappamukhatāvasena pana sabbasmiṁ mahaggatānuttare jhānadhamme ‘‘appanā’’ti aṭṭhakathāvohāro.
anya-e0103n3:5_7: Gāmādīnaṁ samīpaṭṭhāne gāmūpacārādisamaññā viyāti āha ‘‘upacārappanāvasena duvidho’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:5_10: tappariyāpannatāya loke niyutto, tattha vā viditoti lokiyo.
anya-e0103n3:5_11: Tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttaro uttiṇṇoti lokuttaro.
anya-e0103n3:5_13: ubhayaṁ pana ekajjhaṁ gahetvā tato itaraṁ niddhāretuṁ ‘‘lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:5_14: Sappītikanippītikavasenāti saha pītiyā vattatīti sappītiko, pītisampayutto.
anya-e0103n3:5_15: Natthi etassa pītīti nippītiko, pītivippayutto. Tesaṁ vasena.
anya-e0103n3:5_16: Sukhena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṁ gatoti sukhasahagato, sukhasampayuttoti attho. Upekkhāsahagatepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n3:5_21: upekkhāsahagata-padena pana nippītikekadesovāti ayametesaṁ padānaṁ viseso.
anya-e0103n3:6_5: Sampayogavasena pavattamānena saha vitakkena savitakko, saha vicārena savicāro,
anya-e0103n3:6_6: savitakko ca so savicāro cāti savitakkasavicāro.
anya-e0103n3:6_8: Tattha vicārato uttari vitakkena sampayogābhāvato avitakko ca so vicāramatto cāti avitakkavicāramatto.
anya-e0103n3:6_10: Savitakkasavicāro hi samādhi vitakkavisiṭṭhena vicārena savicāro,
anya-e0103n3:6_11: ayaṁ pana vicāramattena vitakkasaṅkhātavisesarahitena, tasmā avitakkavicāramatto.
anya-e0103n3:6_12: Atha vā bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkābhāvenāyaṁ vicāramatto,
anya-e0103n3:6_13: na vicārato aññassa attano sampayuttadhammassa kassaci abhāvāti dassetuṁ avitakka-vacanena vicāramatta-padaṁ visesetvā vuttaṁ. Ubhayarahito avitakkāvicāro.
anya-e0103n3:6_18: ayampi appānubhāvatāya paritto viyāti paritto. Kilesavikkhambhanato, vipulaphalato,
anya-e0103n3:6_20: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gato paṭipannoti mahaggato.
anya-e0103n3:7_2: Pakatipaññāya abhivisiṭṭhattā abhiññā nāma appanāvahā bhāvanāpaññā,
anya-e0103n3:7_4: Dukkhāpaṭipado ca so dandhābhiñño cāti dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiñño, samādhi. Tadādivasena.
anya-e0103n3:9_1: Imesaṁ vasenāti imesaṁ dasannaṁ kammaṭṭhānānaṁ vasena.
anya-e0103n3:9_2: ‘‘Pubbabhāge ekaggatā’’ti iminā appanāya upakārakanānāvajjanupacārassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na ekāvajjanasseva.
anya-e0103n3:9_3: Appanāsamādhīnanti upakattabbaupakārakasambandhe sāmivacanaṁ ‘‘purisassa attho’’tiādīsu viya. Parikammanti gotrabhu.
anya-e0103n3:10_2: siyā nippītikoti aniyamavacanaṁ upacārasamādhisāmaññena sabbesampi vā jhānānaṁ nānāvajjanavīthiyaṁ upacārasamādhi siyā sappītiko, siyā nippītiko.
anya-e0103n3:10_3: Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṁ pana ādito dukatikajjhānānaṁ upacārasamādhi sappītikova, itaresaṁ nippītikova,
anya-e0103n3:10_6: siyā upekkhāsahagatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:12_3: Subhāvitoti suṭṭhu bhāvito sammadeva paguṇataṁ upanīto. Tenāha ‘‘vasippatto’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:12_9: kevalaṁ alobhajjhāsayena pavattito majjhimo, parahitāya pavattito paṇīto.
anya-e0103n3:13_0: Saddhiṁ upacārasamādhināti sabbesampi jhānānaṁ upacārasamādhinā saha.
anya-e0103n3:13_1: Vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṁdisvāti vitakkeyeva oḷārikato upaṭṭhahante ‘‘cittassa khobhakaradhammo aya’’nti ādīnavaṁ disvā vicārañca santato manasi karitvā. Tenāha ‘‘vicāre adisvā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:13_2: Taṁ sandhāyāti taṁ evaṁ paṭiladdhaṁ samādhiṁ sandhāya.
anya-e0103n3:13_3: Etaṁ ‘‘avitakkavicāramatto samādhī’’ti dutiyapadaṁ vuttaṁ. Tīsūti ādito tīsu.
anya-e0103n3:14_3: Avasāneti dvīsupi nayesu pariyosānajjhāne. Yathākkamaṁ catutthe, pañcame vā.
anya-e0103n3:14_4: Pītisukhasahagato vāti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:14_5: Ettha ca satipi pītisahagatassāpi samādhissa sukhasahagatatte tīṇipi padāni asaṅkarato dassetuṁ nippītikasukhato sappītikasukhassa visesadassanatthaṁ satthu pītitikadesanāti nippītikasseva sukhassa vasena sukhasahagato samādhi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:15_1: Cittuppādo hi sahajātadhammānaṁ uppattiṭṭhānatāya ‘‘bhūmī’’ti vuccati ‘‘sukhabhūmiyaṁ kāmāvacare’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 988) viya.
anya-e0103n3:17_0: Paṭhamasamannāhāro bhāvanaṁ ārabhantassa ‘‘pathavī pathavī’’tiādinā kammaṭṭhāne paṭhamābhiniveso.
anya-e0103n3:17_1: Tassa tassa jhānassa upacāranti nīvaraṇavitakkavicāranikantiādīnaṁ vūpasame thirabhūtaṁ kāmāvacarajjhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:17_2: ‘‘Yāva appanā’’ti iminā pubbabhāgapaññāya eva abhiññābhāvo vutto viya dissatīti vadanti . Appanāpaññā pana abhiññāva.
anya-e0103n3:17_3: Yadaggena hi pubbabhāgapaññāya dandhasīghatā, tadaggena appanāpaññāyapīti.
anya-e0103n3:17_4: Samudācāragahaṇatāyāti samudācārassa gahaṇabhāvena, pavattibāhullatoti attho. Asukhāsevanāti kasirabhāvanā.
anya-e0103n3:18_1: Asappāyasevīti upacārādhigamato pubbe asappāyasevitāya dukkhā paṭipadā.
anya-e0103n3:18_4: Pubbabhāgeti upacārajjhānādhigamato orabhāge. Aparabhāgeti tato uddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:18_5: Tassa vomissakatāti yo pubbabhāge asappāyaṁ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī,
anya-e0103n3:18_9: Akatapalibodhupacchedassa saparipanthatāya paṭipadā dukkhā hoti, itarassa sukhā.
anya-e0103n3:18_10: Asampāditaappanākosallassa ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti, visadatāya khippā abhiññā.
anya-e0103n3:19_1: Samathavipassanādhikāravasenāti samathavipassanāsu asato, sato ca adhikārassa vasena.
anya-e0103n3:19_2: Taṇhāya samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā sā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthinīti āha ‘‘taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hotī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:19_3: Abhibhavo cassā itarakilesehi adhikatāya anabhibhūtassa taṇhāyāti adhikārato veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:19_4: Tathā avijjā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhāti tadabhibhūtassa dandhābhiññatā vuttā.
anya-e0103n3:19_5: Akatādhikāroti bhavantare akataparicayo yathā paguṇaṁ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena suppavatti vācuggatova hoti,
anya-e0103n3:19_6: evaṁ pubbe kataparicayassa bhāvanā appakasireneva ijjhatīti āha ‘‘katādhikārassa sukhā’’ti. Svāyaṁ akato,
anya-e0103n3:19_7: kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṁ vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya.
anya-e0103n3:20_0: Yathāvuttā paṭipadābhiññā puggalādhiṭṭhānāti dhammaniddesampi puggalādhiṭṭhānamukhena dassetuṁ ‘‘yo puggalo’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:20_3: Ayaṁ parittoti ayaṁ samādhi appānubhāvatāya paritto.
anya-e0103n3:20_4: Avaḍḍhiteti ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhite yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe.
anya-e0103n3:20_6: ‘‘Paguṇo subhāvito’’ti vatvā ‘‘uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ sakkotī’’ti iminā yathā paguṇopi uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ asakkonto samādhi parittoyeva hoti, na appamāṇo,
anya-e0103n3:20_7: evaṁ ñāṇuttarassa ekāsaneneva uparijhānanibbattanenāti subhāvitopi uparijhānassa paccayabhāvasaṅkhātāya subhāvitakiccasiddhiyā ‘‘appamāṇo’’tveva vuccati.
anya-e0103n3:20_8: Apare pana sace subhāvito paguṇo vasībhāvaṁ patto uparijhānassa paccayo ahontopi appamāṇo eva,
anya-e0103n3:20_10: Vuttalakkhaṇavomissatāyāti yo appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ na sakkoti, vaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṁ paritto appamāṇārammaṇo.
anya-e0103n3:20_11: Yo pana paguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṁ sakkoti, avaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto,
anya-e0103n3:20_12: ayaṁ appamāṇo parittārammaṇoti evaṁ paṭhamacatutthasamādhīnaṁ vuttalakkhaṇassa vomissakabhāvena dutiyatatiyasamādhisaṅgāhako vomissakanayo veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:21_3: ‘‘senaṅgaṁ rathaṅga’’ntiādīsu viyāti āha ‘‘catunnaṁ jhānānaṁ aṅgabhūtā cattāro samādhī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:22_1: hānabhāgo vā etassa atthīti hānabhāgiyo, parihānakoṭṭhāsikoti attho.
anya-e0103n3:22_2: Ālayassa apekkhāya apariccajanato ṭhitiṁ bhajatīti ṭhitibhāgiyo.
anya-e0103n3:22_4: Paccanīkasamudācāravasenāti tassa tassa jhānassa paccanīkānaṁ nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṁ pavattivasena.
anya-e0103n3:22_7: tadassādasampayuttakkhandhasaṅkhātā vā micchāsatī’’ti sammohavinodaniyaṁ (vibha. aṭṭha. 799) vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:22_8: Tattha sāpekkhassa upari visesaṁ nibbattetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā avigatanikantikā taṁtaṁpariharaṇasatītipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0103n3:22_9: Evañca katvā ‘‘satiyā vā nikantiyā vā’’ti vikappavacanañca yuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n3:22_11: visesaṁ vā adhigacchati etenāti visesādhigamo, tassa vasena.
anya-e0103n3:22_13: Nibbedhabhāgiyatāti saccānaṁ nibbijjhanapakkhikatā vipassanāya saṁvattatīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:23_1: Avitakkasahagatāti ‘‘kathaṁ nu kho me avitakkaṁ jhānaṁ bhaveyyā’’ti evaṁ avitakkārammaṇā avitakkavisayā.
anya-e0103n3:23_3: samādhissāpi panettha saṅgaho atthevāti udāharaṇassa sātthakataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā samādhīpi cattāro hontī’’ti tesaṁ vasena evaṁ vuttanti attho.
anya-e0103n3:24_0: Bhāvanāmayassa samādhissa idhādhippetattā upacārekaggatā ‘‘kāmāvacaro samādhī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:24_4: Labhati samādhinti evaṁ yaṁ samādhiṁ labhati, ayaṁ vuccati chandasamādhi, chandādhipatisamādhīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:25_1: Aññattha sampayogavasena vicārena saha vattamāno vitakko pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne viyojitopi na suṭṭhu viyojitoti,
anya-e0103n3:25_2: tena saddhiṁyeva vicārasamatikkamaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiya’’nti.
anya-e0103n3:25_3: Dvidhā bhinditvā catukkabhede vuttaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānanti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:25_4: Pañcajhānaṅgavasenāti pañcannaṁ jhānānaṁ aṅgabhāvavasena samādhissa pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:26_3: Tattha hānabhāgiyo dhammoti apaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṁ kāmādianupakkhandanaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:26_4: Visesabhāgiyo dhammoti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṁ dutiyajjhānādianupakkhandanaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:26_6: 828) – apaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhīnaṁ tato vuṭṭhitaṁ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti codenti tudanti,
anya-e0103n3:26_7: tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṁ saññāmanasikārānaṁ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā hāyati, tasmā hānabhāginī paññā.
anya-e0103n3:26_8: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ santato paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena avitakkasahagatā samudācaranti paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṁ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti,
anya-e0103n3:26_9: tassa dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṁ saññāmanasikārānaṁ vasena paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa uppattiyā padaṭṭhānatāya visesabhāginī paññā.
anya-e0103n3:26_11: Iminā nayenāti iminā paṭhamajjhāne vuttena vidhinā dutiyajjhānādīsupi hānabhāgiyadhammo,
anya-e0103n3:28_1: sappītikādiggahaṇena sādhāraṇato ca ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto.
anya-e0103n3:28_2: Bhāvito hoti saññāya sampayuttattā. Tanti ariyamaggasamādhiṁ.
anya-e0103n3:28_3: Visunti paññābhāvanāya visuṁ katvā na vadāma.
anya-e0103n3:29_0: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṁ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṁ na detīti palibodho ra-kārassa la-kāraṁ katvā, paripanthoti attho. Upacchinditvāti samāpanena, saṅgahaṇena vā uparundhitvā, apalibodhaṁ katvāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:30_2: Vihāre bhikkhūnaṁ taṁ taṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ. Svāyaṁ āvāso.
anya-e0103n3:30_3: Navakammādīsūti ādi-saddena āvāsassa tadaññaṁ abhivuddhikāraṇaṁ saṅgaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n3:31_2: ‘‘Nāmā’’ti iminā tassa padesassa ayaṁ samaññāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:31_3: Paṭisāmitamevāti niccakālaṁ paṭisāmetvāva vihārato nikkhamāmīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:31_6: Etena ‘‘bhikkhunā nāma āvāse evarūpena bhavitabba’’nti ovādo dinno hoti.
anya-e0103n3:32_0: Kulanti kulaggahaṇena kulamanussānaṁ gahaṇaṁ gāmaggahaṇena gāmavāsīnaṁ viya.
anya-e0103n3:32_3: pāṭhaṁ uddisāpetvā sajjhāyitunti attho. Idhevāti imasmiṁyeva padese,
anya-e0103n3:33_1: Sadāti gatakālato pabhuti visesato pavāritadivasato paṭṭhāya sabbadā divase divase.
anya-e0103n3:33_3: Sabbaṁ pavattinti attanā tattha diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pacchā samāgamapariyosānaṁ daharassa sabbaṁ pavattiṁ.
anya-e0103n3:34_1: Rathavinītapaṭipadanti dasakathāvatthukittanapubbikaṁ rathavinītūpamāhi vibhāvitaṁ rathavinītasutte (ma. ni.
anya-e0103n3:36_0: Ghāsesanaṁ chinnakatho, na vācaṁ payutaṁ bhaṇe’’. (su. ni. 716);
anya-e0103n3:38_1: Catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmatādīpakanti cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu santosassa, bhāvanārāmatāya ca pakāsakaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:39_2: Piṇḍapātaṁ tāva dentā buddhapūjāpattacīvarādīni tassa parivārāni katvā denti, tathā cīvarādidānepi.
anya-e0103n3:39_4: Vadantīti purimadivase bhikkhāya āhiṇḍanakāle yathāsutaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0103n3:40_1: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena gaṇavācakassa pariyesanampi lahukameva icchitabbanti āha ‘‘yojanato paraṁ agantvā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:41_0: Katākateti kate ca akate ca kamme jānanavasena ussukkaṁ āpajjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:41_1: katākateti vā appake ca mahante ca kate, yathā ‘‘phalāphale’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:42_0: Pabbajjāpekkhoti sīhaḷadīpe kira kuladārakānaṁ pabbajjā āvāhavivāhasadisā,
anya-e0103n3:42_1: tasmā taṁ paricchinnadivasaṁ atikkametuṁ na sakkā.
anya-e0103n3:42_2: ‘‘Sace taṁ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetu’’ntiādinā samāpanena palibodhupacchedo vutto,
anya-e0103n3:42_3: byatirekato pana ‘‘sace taṁ alabhanto sakkoti adhivāsetuṁ,
anya-e0103n3:42_4: araññaṁ pavisitvā samaṇadhammova kātabbo’’ti ayamattho dassitoti saṅgahaṇena palibodhupacchedo veditabbo. Esa nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n3:43_0: Tathāti yathā upajjhāyo gilāno yāvajīvaṁ upaṭṭhātabbo,
anya-e0103n3:43_1: tathā upasampāditaantevāsiko attano kammavācaṁ vatvā upasampādito.
anya-e0103n3:44_0: Yo koci rogoti mūlabhūto, anubandho vā attano uppanno.
anya-e0103n3:45_2: Yassa ganthadhuraṁ vissajjetvā ṭhitassāpi gantho vattateva, na tassa gantho palibodho.
anya-e0103n3:45_4: nāpi sabbena sabbaṁ aganthapasutassa. Majjhimapaṇṇāsako āgacchati,
anya-e0103n3:45_6: Puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā ganthadhuraṁ vissajjemīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:46_7: Attano ācariyānanti attano kathetuṁ yuttānaṁ ācariyānaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:46_8: Suvinicchitā sabbā tipiṭakapariyatti etasmiṁ atthīti sabbapariyattiko, tepiṭakoti attho.
anya-e0103n3:46_9: Pīṭhe nisinno tato otaritvā bhūmiyaṁ taṭṭikāya nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n3:46_11: Cīvaraṁ pārupitvāti ācariyassa apacitidassanatthaṁ parimaṇḍalaṁ cīvaraṁ pārupitvā. Sāṭheyyābhāvato uju.
anya-e0103n3:47_4: Yebhuyyena hi jhānalābhī samathayānikova hoti vipassanāsukhato. Itarenāti samathatthikena. Avasesā nava palibodhā.
anya-e0103n3:49_1: Kammaṭṭhāne niyutto kammaṭṭhāniko, bhāvanamanuyuñjanto. Tena kammaṭṭhānikena.
anya-e0103n3:49_2: Paricchinditvāti ‘‘imasmiṁ vihāre sabbe bhikkhū’’ti evaṁ paricchinditvā. Sahavāsīnaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:49_4: ayañca sahavāsīnaṁ cittamaddavajananādiattho ‘‘manussānaṁ piyo hotī’’tiādinayappavattena mettānisaṁsasuttena (a. ni. 11.15; paṭi. ma. 2.22; mi. pa. 4.4.6) dīpetabbo.
anya-e0103n3:50_0: Niccaṁ pariharitabbattāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṁ viya ekadāva ananuyuñjitvā sabbakālaṁ pariharaṇīyattā anuyuñjitabbattā.
anya-e0103n3:50_2: Kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
anya-e0103n3:50_3: Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṁ, kammaphalañca,
anya-e0103n3:50_4: tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṁ sattesu hitesitaṁ na pariccajati.
anya-e0103n3:50_5: Sīlasampattiyā sattānaṁ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
anya-e0103n3:50_6: sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṁyuttānaṁ gambhīrānaṁ kathānaṁ kattā hoti,
anya-e0103n3:50_7: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho,
anya-e0103n3:50_12: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṁ hitāhitaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānitvā samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahitaṁ nisedhetvā hite niyojeti.
anya-e0103n3:51_0: Taṁ pana kalyāṇamittaṁ paramukkaṁsagataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘mamaṁ hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Kārakabhāvaṁ yogakammassa.
anya-e0103n3:51_1: Pakāseti attānaṁ paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanena samuttejanāya, sampahaṁsanāya ca,
anya-e0103n3:51_8: Na attanomatiṁ pakāseti kathetīti na attanomatiko,
anya-e0103n3:51_9: attano matiṁ paggayha vattā na hotīti attho.
anya-e0103n3:52_0: ‘‘Pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo’’tiādi ekaccakhīṇāsavato bahussutova kammaṭṭhānadāne seyyoti dassanatthaṁ āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:52_1: Tattha pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayoti ‘‘yaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetukāmo’’tiādinā vuttakhīṇāsavādikā.
anya-e0103n3:52_2: Uggahaparipucchānaṁ visodhitattāti uggahetabbato ‘‘uggaho’’ti laddhanāmāya kammaṭṭhānupakārāya pāḷiyā,
anya-e0103n3:52_3: tadatthaṁ paripucchanato ‘‘paripucchā’’ti laddhasamaññāya atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya ca visesato sodhitattā niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā gahitattā.
anya-e0103n3:52_4: Ito cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca sallakkhetvāti pañcasupi nikāyesu ito cito ca tassa tassa kammaṭṭhānassa anurūpaṁ suttapadañceva suttānugataṁ yuttiñca suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā.
anya-e0103n3:52_7: samādāya vā sammadeva hadaye ṭhapetvāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:52_8: Mahāmaggaṁ dassentoti kammaṭṭhānavidhiṁ mahāmaggaṁ katvā dassento.
anya-e0103n3:53_2: nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti yathārahaṁ taṁ taṁ vattaṁ pūrentena.
anya-e0103n3:53_4: sabbesaṁ vā bhikkhūnaṁ atthāya pariharitabbatelaṁ. Ṭhapemīti anujānāpanaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:53_6: Ekadivasaṁ sāyaṁ vissajjitenāpīti yojanā. Ārocetabbaṁ āgamanakāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:55_1: Santāne rāgassa ussannabhāvena caraṇaṁ pavatti rāgacariyā,
anya-e0103n3:55_2: sā sassatāsayādayo viya daṭṭhabbā. Tathā dosacariyādayo.
anya-e0103n3:55_7: Imā eva hi sandhāya ‘‘aparāpi catasso’’ti vuttaṁ. Tathāti yathā rāgādīnaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:55_8: tathā saddhādīnaṁ saṁsaggasannipātavasena saddhābuddhicariyā saddhāvitakkacariyā buddhivitakkacariyā saddhābuddhivitakkacariyāti. Imā aparāpi catasso.
anya-e0103n3:55_10: Saṁsagganti saṁsajjanaṁ missīkaraṇaṁ ‘‘rāgasaddhācariyā dosasaddhācariyā’’tiādinā. Anekāti tesaṭṭhi, tato atirekāpi vā,
anya-e0103n3:55_11: tā pana asammohantena saṁyuttasuttaṭīkāyaṁ vitthārato dassitāti tattha vuttanayena veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:55_12: ‘‘Pakatī’’ti iminā asati paṭipakkhabhāvanāyaṁ tattha tattha santāne cariyāya sabhāvabhūtataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n3:55_14: yato rāgacariyādīnaṁ paccayasamavāye rāgādayo balavanto honti, abhiṇhañca pavattanti.
anya-e0103n3:55_15: Tāsaṁ vasenāti channaṁ mūlacariyānaṁ vasena chaḷeva puggalā honti. Aññathā anekapuggalā siyuṁ,
anya-e0103n3:55_16: tathā ca sati adhippetatthasiddhi ca na siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n3:56_0: Saddhā balavatī hoti rāgussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n3:56_3: Sabhāgo hi dūrepi āsanneyevāti sabhāgatālakkhaṇamidha āsannaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:56_4: Tattha saddhāya siniyhanaṁ pasādavasena akālussiyaṁ alūkhatā , rāgassa pana rañjanavasena.
anya-e0103n3:56_5: Saddhāya pariyesanaṁ adhimuccanavasena tanninnatā, rāgassa taṇhāyanavasena.
anya-e0103n3:56_7: rāgassa abhisaṅgavasenāti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṁ yathā alūkhatādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n3:56_8: evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ‘‘rāgacaritassa saddhācarito sabhāgo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:57_0: Paññā balavatī hoti dosussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato.
anya-e0103n3:57_3: Tattha paññāya ārammaṇassa anallīyanaṁ tassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhavasena visaṁsaṭṭhatā,
anya-e0103n3:57_7: dosassa ahitādhānavasena chaḍḍananti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṁ yathā anallīyanādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n3:57_8: evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ‘‘dosacaritassa buddhicarito sabhāgo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:58_0: Antarāyakarā vitakkāti micchāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā uppajjanti mohussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa yebhuyyena pavattisabbhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:58_6: mohassa anogāḷhatāyāti evaṁ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṁ yathā anavaṭṭhānādisāmaññena sabhāgatā,
anya-e0103n3:58_7: evaṁ taṁsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ‘‘mohacaritassa vitakkacarito sabhāgo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:59_3: dosādayo viya tena vippayutto natthīti adhippāyo. Tadubhayanti taṇhāmānadvayaṁ. Nātivattatīti sabhāvato,
anya-e0103n3:59_5: Kāmañcettha yathā rāgadosehi sampayogavasena saha vattamānassapi mohassa ussannatāvasena visuṁ cariyābhāvo, na kevalaṁ mohasseva, tathā saddhābuddhivitakkānaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:59_6: Evaṁ rāgena satipi sampayoge mānassāpi visuṁ cariyābhāvo yutto siyā,
anya-e0103n3:59_7: evaṁ santepi rāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchāvijjānaṁ viya anusayaṭṭho imesaṁ rāgādīnaṁyeva āveṇiko cariyaṭṭhoti, nattheva mānacariyā.
anya-e0103n3:59_8: Yato cariyā ‘‘pakatī’’ti vuttā. Pakati ca sabhāvoti.
anya-e0103n3:59_9: Eteneva diṭṭhiyāpi visuṁ cariyābhāvābhāvo saṁvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:59_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana mohacariyantogadhāva diṭṭhicariyāti dassetuṁ ‘‘mohanidānattā cā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:59_11: Tattha ca-saddena sampayogaṁ samuccinoti mohanidānattā, mohasampayuttattā cāti.
anya-e0103n3:60_4: Pubbe kirāti kira-saddo arucisūcanattho. Iṭṭhappayogo manāpakiriyā.
anya-e0103n3:60_9: Etena asati pubbahetuniyāme yathāvuttakāraṇamattena na tesaṁ luddhatā,
anya-e0103n3:61_0: Itareti chedanādikammabahulā nirayādito idhūpapannā ca na sabbe dosamohacaritā eva hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:61_2: mūḷhabhāve ca anekantikattā dosamohacaritatāyapi anekaṁsikatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n3:61_3: Dhātūnaṁ ussadaniyamo yadi pamāṇato, so natthi, atha sāmatthiyato,
anya-e0103n3:61_4: sopi ekaṁsiko na upalabbhatīti dassento āha ‘‘yathāvutteneva nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:61_6: Dosaniyameti semhādidosādhikatāya rāgādicarito hotīti dosavasena cariyāniyame ‘‘semhādhiko rāgacarito’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘semhādhiko mohacarito’’ti,
anya-e0103n3:61_7: ‘‘vātādhiko mohacarito’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘vātādhiko rāgacarito’’ti ca vuttattā tampi dosavasena niyamavacanaṁ pubbāparaviruddhameva.
anya-e0103n3:61_8: Aparicchinnavacananti paricchedakārikāya paññāya na paricchinditvā vuttavacanaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:62_2: Niyāmoti ca tesaṁyeva lobhādīnaṁ paṭiniyato lubbhanādisabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n3:62_3: Lobho ussado etesanti lobhussadā, ussannalobhā, lobhādhikāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:62_5: Tena ye ime lobhussadatādīnaṁ paccekaṁ vomissato ca cuddasa pabhedā icchitā,
anya-e0103n3:62_6: te anavasesato sampiṇḍeti yathāvuttesu chasveva tesaṁ antogadhattā.
anya-e0103n3:63_0: Idāni taṁ nesaṁ lobhussadatādīnaṁ paccekaṁ vomissakatādiṁ vibhāgena dassetuṁ ‘‘yassa hī’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:63_2: Lobho balavāti lobho tajjāya paccayasāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato adhiko hoti.
anya-e0103n3:63_4: Kathaṁ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṁ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattantīti?
anya-e0103n3:63_5: Na kho panetaṁ evaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ ‘‘ekakkhaṇe pavattantī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:63_6: Nikantikkhaṇaṁ pana āyūhanapakkhiyameva katvā evaṁ vuttaṁ. Eseva nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n3:63_8: Yo hi ‘‘evaṁsundaraṁ evaṁvipulaṁ evaṁmahagghañca na sakkā dātu’’ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena pavattāya cetanāya sampayutto alobho,
anya-e0103n3:63_9: so sammadeva lobhaṁ pariyādātuṁ na sakkoti. Dosamohānaṁ anuppattiyā,
anya-e0103n3:63_12: alobhadosamohānañca dubbalabhāvatoti vuttameva kāraṇaṁ paccāmasati. Soti taṁsamaṅgīpuggalo.
anya-e0103n3:63_13: Tena kammenāti tena lobhādiupanissayavatā kusalakammunā. Sukhasīloti sakhilo.
anya-e0103n3:64_0: Purimanayenevāti pubbe vuttanayānusārena mandā alobhādosā lobhadose pariyādātuṁ na sakkonti,
anya-e0103n3:64_1: amoho pana balavā mohaṁ pariyādātuṁ sakkotīti evaṁ tattha tattha vāre yathārahaṁ atidesattho veditabbo. Duṭṭhoti kodhano. Dandhoti mandapañño. Sīlakoti sukhasīlo.
anya-e0103n3:65_2: eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā,
anya-e0103n3:65_3: tathā kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti. Tattha alobhadosāmohā, alobhādosamohā,
anya-e0103n3:65_4: alobhadosamohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti,
anya-e0103n3:65_6: lobhādosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadaamohussadaadosāmohussadavārā gahitā evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā.
anya-e0103n3:65_7: Ye pana ubhayesaṁ missatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā,
anya-e0103n3:65_9: Na hi ekasmiṁ santāne antarena avatthantaraṁ ‘‘lobho ca balavā, alobho cā’’tiādi yujjatīti,
anya-e0103n3:65_10: paṭipakkhavasena vā hi etesaṁ balavadubbalabhāvo, sahajātadhammavasena vā.
anya-e0103n3:65_11: Tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena alobhena anadhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo,
anya-e0103n3:65_15: Tena vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘lobho balavā alobho mando,
anya-e0103n3:65_17: So ca nesaṁ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.
anya-e0103n3:66_0: Yo luddhoti vuttoti yo ussadakittane ‘‘luddho’’ti vutto,
anya-e0103n3:66_2: dandho’’ti ca vuttā yathākkamaṁ dosamohacaritā. Paññavāti sātisayaṁ sappañño.
anya-e0103n3:66_4: Alobhādosānaṁ balavabhāvo saddhūpanissayatāya vinā na hotīti āha ‘‘aluddhaaduṭṭhā pasannapakatitāya saddhācaritā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:67_0: Ayañca nayo sādhāraṇato vuttoti nibbattitapubbahetuniyāmavaseneva buddhicaritādikepi dassetuṁ ‘‘yathā vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:67_2: upanissayato sampayogato ca paññāya abhisaṅkhatenāti attho. Sesapadattayepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n3:67_3: Lobhādinā vomissaparivārenāti ettha lobhamohādinā aññamaññaaviruddhavomissaparivārenāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:67_6: Ekaṁsena ca missakacariyāpi sampaṭicchitabbā pubbahetuniyāmena cariyāsiddhito.
anya-e0103n3:67_7: Tathā ceva ussadakittanaṁ pavattaṁ yathārahaṁ lobhālobhādīnaṁ vipākassa paccayabhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:68_0: ‘‘Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
anya-e0103n3:68_1: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n3:68_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n3:68_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
anya-e0103n3:69_1: Pubbahetuniyāmena ca yathā tihetukassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ, na tathā duhetukassa.
anya-e0103n3:69_2: Yathā ca duhetukassa itikattabbatā nepakkaṁ, na tathā ahetukassa.
anya-e0103n3:69_3: Evaṁ lobhussadādayo puggalā rāgacaritādayo hontīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0103n3:70_1: Puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttopi attho dhammamukheneva paññāyatīti dhammādhiṭṭhānenāha ‘‘cariyāyo vibhāvaye’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:70_6: Anukaḍḍhitanti pādanikkhepasamaye kaḍḍhanto viya pādaṁ nikkhipati.
anya-e0103n3:70_7: Tenassa padaṁ anukaḍḍhitaṁ pacchato añchitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n3:70_9: Chambhito viyāti vitthāyanto viya. Bhīto viyāti keci.
anya-e0103n3:70_13: Idamīdisaṁ padanti bhagavato padaṁ disvā vadati.
anya-e0103n3:71_1: Thaddhākāranti thambhitākāraṁ. Ataramānoti nataramāno, saṇikanti attho.
anya-e0103n3:71_3: Nipajjitvāti kāyapasāraṇalakkhaṇāya nipajjāya seyyāya nipajjitvā sayati niddāyati.
anya-e0103n3:71_4: Pakkhittakāyoti avakkhittakāyo avaso viya sahasā patitakāyo.
anya-e0103n3:73_0: Nipuṇamadhurasamasakkaccakārīti sukosallaṁ sundaraṁ avisamaṁ sābhisaṅkhārañca karaṇasīlo.
anya-e0103n3:73_1: Gāḷhathaddhavisamakārīti thiraṁ asithilaṁ visamañca karaṇasīlo. Aparicchinnaṁ apariniṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:76_6: cīvarādiparikkhārassa ca maṇḍanavasena pavattaṁ loluppaṁ cāpalyaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:77_2: Parassa guṇe ḍaṁsitvā apanento viya yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso.
anya-e0103n3:78_0: Anussāhanaṁ thinaṁ. Asattivighāto middhaṁ. Cetaso avūpasamo uddhaccaṁ. Vippaṭisāro kukkuccaṁ. Saṁsayo vicikicchā.
anya-e0103n3:80_3: ‘‘Evañca evañca karissāmī’’ti kiccānaṁ rattibhāge parivitakkanaṁ rattiṁ dhūmāyanā.
anya-e0103n3:80_4: Tathāvitakkitānaṁ tesaṁ divasabhāge anuṭṭhānaṁ divā pajjalanā.
anya-e0103n3:80_5: Hurāhuraṁ dhāvanāti ito cito ca tattha tattha ārammaṇe cittavosaggo.
anya-e0103n3:81_1: aṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatamevāti na sakkā vattunti ‘‘sabbākārenā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:81_2: Kiñci kiñci āgatampi atthevāti hi adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n3:81_3: ‘‘Na sārato paccetabba’’nti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṁ dassento ‘‘rāgacaritassa hī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n3:81_4: Appamādavihārinoti tattha vinidhāya bhāvaṁ paṭipajjanena appamādakārino.
anya-e0103n3:81_5: Bhinnalakkhaṇā iriyāpathādayoti cāturiyena acāturiyena saṇikaṁ, sahasā ca gamanādayo. Na upapajjantīti na yujjanti.
anya-e0103n3:82_3: Ekato onatassa pabbatapādassa heṭṭhābhāgo akatabhittibhūmiparikammo akatapabbhāro.
anya-e0103n3:82_7: Sīhabyagghādibhayena sāsaṅkaṁ. Durūpanti virūpaṁ. Dubbaṇṇanti asundaravaṇṇaṁ, dussaṇṭhānaṁ vā.
anya-e0103n3:82_9: Sāṇi viya kharasamphassanti sāṇiphalako viya dukkhasamphassaṁ. Bhārikabhāvena,
anya-e0103n3:82_10: antarantarā tunnakaraṇena ca kicchapariharaṇaṁ. Āṇigaṇṭhikāhatoti āṇinā, gaṇṭhiyā ca hatasobho. Idaṁ rāgacaritassa sappāyaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:82_11: evamassa kilesasamudācāro na hotīti adhippāyo. Eseva nayo sesesupi.
anya-e0103n3:84_0: Vitakkavidhāvanasseva paccayo hoti yathā taṁ āyasmato meghiyattherassa. Darīmukheti pabbatavivare. Parittanti suppasarāvamattaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:85_0: Pabhedaparicchedato nidānaparicchedato vibhāvanaparicchedato sappāyaparicchedatoti paccekaṁ pariccheda-saddo yojetabbo.
anya-e0103n3:85_2: Ekaccakasiṇānussatiṭṭhānamattassa pasaṅgena kathitattā vuttaṁ ‘‘na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ sabbākārena āvikata’’nti.
anya-e0103n3:87_2: ettakāni appanājjhānāvahānī’’ti upacārappanāvahato. ‘‘Ettakāni ekajjhānikāni, ettakāni dukatikajjhānikāni,
anya-e0103n3:89_0: Dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayarūpassa sattassa cittaṁ ādikammiko cetopariyañāṇena paricchindituṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0103n3:89_1: na itarassāti kasiṇapharaṇaṁ cetopariyañāṇassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0103n3:89_2: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṁ samattho hotī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:89_4: Tathā uggahakosallassa sampāditattā paricchinnākāreneva tāni upatiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0103n3:89_5: tasmā na tattha vaḍḍhanāti adhippāyo. Sace pana koci vaḍḍheyya,
anya-e0103n3:89_6: na tena koci guṇoti dassento āha ‘‘ānisaṁsābhāvā cā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:90_5: Thero hi paramāya vasipattiyā assamaṇḍale assaṁ sārento viya yattha tattha nisinnopi ṭhitopi taṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjateva.
anya-e0103n3:90_6: Tenassa samantato nimittaṁ vaḍḍhitaṁ viya upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n3:91_1: Ninnathalādivasena hi ekadese aṭṭhatvā samantato gahaṇavasena sakalasarīre nimittaṁ gaṇhantassa taṁ mahantaṁ hoti. Mahante vā sarīre.
anya-e0103n3:91_2: Appaketi sarīrassa ekadese nimittaṁ gaṇhātīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n3:91_3: Appake vā khuddake dārakasarīre. Etanti asubhanimittaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:91_5: na ca koci ānisaṁso’’ti vuttaṁ ādīnavaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:92_0: Sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbānīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ upapattito vivarituṁ ‘‘kasmā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:92_1: Picupiṇḍādivasena upaṭṭhahantampi nimittaṁ vātasaṅghātasannissayanti katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:92_3: Vāyokasiṇavaḍḍhane viya na ettha koci guṇo,
anya-e0103n3:92_4: kevalaṁ vātavaḍḍhanamevāti āha ‘‘sādīnavattā’’ti. Tesanti brahmavihārānaṁ. Nimittanti ārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:92_5: Na ca tena attho atthīti tena sattarāsivaḍḍhanena pathavīkasiṇādivaḍḍhane viya kiñci payojanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0103n3:92_6: Pariggahavasenāti apariggahitassa bhāvanāvisayassa pariggahavasena, na nimittavaḍḍhanavasena.
anya-e0103n3:92_11: Yadi evaṁ kathaṁ parittādiārammaṇatā jhānassāti āha ‘‘parittaappamāṇārammaṇatāpettha pariggahavasenā’’ti,
anya-e0103n3:92_12: katipaye satte pariggahetvā pavattā mettādayo parittārammaṇā,
anya-e0103n3:92_17: na itaranti āha ‘‘na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṁvaḍḍhetu’’nti .
anya-e0103n3:93_6: Vātapānavivarādīhi antopaviṭṭhassa sūriyālokādikassa calanākāro paññāyatīti obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇampi calitārammaṇaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:94_1: tattha asubhānaṁ paṭikūlassa ca āhārassa abhāvato.
anya-e0103n3:95_0: Diṭṭhenāti diṭṭhena vatthunā kāraṇabhūtena. Gahetabbānīti uggahetabbāni,
anya-e0103n3:95_2: Ucchusassādīnaṁ pattesu pacalamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena vā tassa gahetabbattā vuttaṁ ‘‘vāyokasiṇaṁ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhenā’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:95_3: Na ādikammikena gahetabbānīti ādikammikena na gahetabbāni,
anya-e0103n3:95_4: bhāvanārambhavasena na paṭṭhapetabbāni, heṭṭhime tayo brahmavihāre,
anya-e0103n3:96_0: Imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇena yathārahaṁ ārammaṇānaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:97_0: ‘‘Ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlānī’’ti ujuvipaccanīkavasena cetaṁ vuttaṁ. Evaṁ sesesupi.
anya-e0103n3:97_2: Anukūlāni rāgavikkhambhanassa upāyabhāvato. Aṭṭha anukūlānīti yojanā. Evaṁ sesesu.
anya-e0103n3:97_4: na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṁ tesaṁ aññassāpi anukūlassa alabbhanato .
anya-e0103n3:97_6: Imasseva ujuvipaccanīkaṁ imassa atisappāyanti gahetabbassa visesassa abhāvato sabbacaritānaṁ anukūlāni. Parittanti sarāvamattaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:98_0: Cattāro dhammāti cattāro manasikaraṇīyā dhammā. Uttarīti sīlasampadā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyadhammassavanaṁ, vīriyaṁ;
anya-e0103n3:98_1: paññāti imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhānato upari.
anya-e0103n3:98_2: Asubhāti asubhabhāvanā ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu bhāvanānuyogā. Mettāti anodhiso,
anya-e0103n3:98_6: Aniccasaññāti ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’’ti (a. ni. 3.137; dha. pa. 277; mahāni.
anya-e0103n3:98_9: Ettha hi ekasseva cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā vuttā, na ekassa catucariyatāya.
anya-e0103n3:100_3: Somanassameva uppajjati ‘‘evaṁ bahuparissayoyaṁ attabhāvo ṭhāneyeva mayā niyyātito’’ti. Tenāha ‘‘yathā hī’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n3:101_2: ācariye aniviṭṭhapematāya vāti tadubhayaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘dubbaco vā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:101_3: Yo hi ācariyena tajjiyamāno kopañca dosañca apaccayañca pātukaroti,
anya-e0103n3:101_4: yo vā ‘‘kimassa santike vāsenā’’ti pakkamati, ayaṁ duvidhopi atajjanīyo.
anya-e0103n3:102_0: Tumhākamatthāyāti vutteti ‘‘sataporise papāte patanena tumhākaṁ koci attho hotī’’ti kenaci vutte.
anya-e0103n3:102_1: Ghaṁsentoti ‘‘manussakakkena tumhākaṁ koci attho’’ti vutte ghaṁsento niravasesaṁ attabhāvaṁ khepetuṁ ussaheyyaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:102_2: ‘‘Mama assāsapassāsanirundhanena tumhākaṁ koci rogavūpasamādiko attho atthī’’ti kenaci vutte.
anya-e0103n3:102_3: Tīhipi bhikkhūhi ācariye bhattipavedanamukhena vīriyārambho eva pavedito.
anya-e0103n3:103_1: Aññattha pavattitvāpi cittaṁ āgamma yattha seti,
anya-e0103n3:103_2: so tassa āsayo ‘‘migāsayo’’ viya, āsayo eva ajjhāsayo. So duvidho vipanno, sampannoti.
anya-e0103n3:103_6: Idāni naṁ vibhāgena dassetuṁ ‘‘alobhādīnaṁ vasenā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:103_9: lokuttarānaṁ upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo, tena.
anya-e0103n3:103_11: anekaguṇāvahato ca sattānaṁ bahukārā visesato yogino.
anya-e0103n3:103_12: Tathā hi alobhādayo maccheramalādīnaṁ paṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1 mūlarāsīvaṇṇanā) –
anya-e0103n3:104_1: amoho kusalesu dhammesu abhāvanāya. Alobho cettha dānahetu, adoso sīlahetu, amoho bhāvanāhetu.
anya-e0103n3:104_2: Tesu ca alobhena anadhikaṁ gaṇhāti luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato,
anya-e0103n3:105_0: ‘‘Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṁ dosaṁ dosato dhārento dose pavattati, luddho hi dosaṁ paṭicchādeti.
anya-e0103n3:105_1: Adosena vijjamānaṁ guṇaṁ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati, duṭṭho hi guṇaṁ makkheti.
anya-e0103n3:105_2: Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṁ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve pavattati ,
anya-e0103n3:105_5: Alobhena ca piyavippayogadukkhaṁ na hoti luddhassa piyasabbhāvato, piyavippayogāsahanato ca,
anya-e0103n3:105_6: adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṁ na hoti duṭṭhassa appiyasabbhāvato, appiyasampayogāsahanato ca,
anya-e0103n3:106_0: ‘‘Alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṁ na hoti alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato,
anya-e0103n3:106_2: adosena jarādukkhaṁ na hoti tikkhadosassa khippaṁ jarāsambhavato,
anya-e0103n3:106_3: amohena maraṇadukkhaṁ na hoti, sammohamaraṇañhi dukkhaṁ, na ca taṁ amūḷhassa hoti. Alobhena ca gahaṭṭhānaṁ, amohena pabbajitānaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:107_0: ‘‘Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti,
anya-e0103n3:107_1: yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya pettivisayaṁ upapajjanti, taṇhāya ca paṭipakkho alobho.
anya-e0103n3:107_3: dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti, dosassa ca paṭipakkho adoso.
anya-e0103n3:107_5: mohena hi niccasammūḷhaṁ tiracchānayoniṁ upapajjanti, mohapaṭipakkho ca amoho.
anya-e0103n3:107_6: Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa abhāvakaro,
anya-e0103n3:108_0: ‘‘Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṁsāsaññāti imā tisso,
anya-e0103n3:108_1: asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti.
anya-e0103n3:108_7: Purimāni ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṁ dvinnaṁ ānubhāvena,
anya-e0103n3:109_1: aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṁ na sevati, tena arogo hoti. Adoso yobbanassa,
anya-e0103n3:109_2: aduṭṭho hi valitapalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno dīgharattaṁ yuvā hoti. Amoho dīghāyukatāya,
anya-e0103n3:109_3: amūḷho hi hitāhitaṁ ñatvā ahitaṁ parivajjento,
anya-e0103n3:110_1: adoso mittasampattiyā mettāya mittānaṁ paṭilābhato, aparihānato ca, amoho attasampattiyā,
anya-e0103n3:110_2: amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṁ sampādeti.
anya-e0103n3:110_3: Alobho ca dibbavihārassa paccayo hoti, adoso brahmavihārassa, amoho ariyavihārassa.
anya-e0103n3:111_0: ‘‘Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti tesaṁ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa dukkhassa abhāvā, adosena parapakkhesu,
anya-e0103n3:112_1: luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato na passati. Adosena dukkhadassanaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:112_2: adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati. Amohena anattadassanaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:112_3: amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo apariṇāyakaṁ khandhapañcakaṁ apariṇāyakato bujjhati.
anya-e0103n3:112_6: Aniccadassanena hi alobho hoti, dukkhadassanena adoso, anattadassanena amoho.
anya-e0103n3:112_7: Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya pihaṁ uppādeyya,
anya-e0103n3:112_8: saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṁ kodhadukkhaṁ uppādeyya,
anya-e0103n3:113_1: upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo’’ti.
anya-e0103n3:114_0: Idāni te ajjhāsaye pāḷiyāva vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘yathāhā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:114_3: Ubhayaṁ pana ekajjhaṁ katvā chabbidhā ajjhāsayāti attho.
anya-e0103n3:114_7: Bodhiparipākāya saṁvattantīti yathābhinīhāraṁ attanā pattabbabodhiyā paripācanāya bhavanti.
anya-e0103n3:114_10: sabbadā ca aluddhā eva hessāmā’’ti, majjhe ca alubbhanavaseneva,
anya-e0103n3:114_12: Lobhe dosadassāvinoti lubbhanalakkhaṇe lobhe sabbappakārena ādīnavadassāvino.
anya-e0103n3:114_13: Idaṁ tassa ajjhāsayassa ekadesato brūhanākāradassanaṁ. Lobhe hi ādīnavaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:114_14: alobhe ca ānisaṁsaṁ passantassa alobhajjhāsayo parivaḍḍhati,
anya-e0103n3:114_17: Ayaṁ pana viseso – nekkhammanti idha pabbajjā. Paviveko tadaṅgaviveko, vikkhambhanaviveko, kāyaviveko, cittaviveko ca. Nissaraṇaṁ nibbānaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:114_18: Sabbabhavagatīsūti sabbesu bhavesu, sabbāsu ca gatīsu.
anya-e0103n3:114_19: Tadadhimuttatāyāti yadatthaṁ bhāvanānuyogo, yadatthā ca pabbajjā, tadadhimuttena.
anya-e0103n3:115_1: ‘‘ke vā te dhammā bahulaṁ samudācarantī’’ti pucchitabbo.
anya-e0103n3:115_2: Kiṁ vāti kiṁ asubhaṁ vā anussatiṭṭhānaṁ vā aññaṁ vā.
anya-e0103n3:115_3: Kiṁ te manasi karoto phāsu hotīti cittassa ekaggabhāvena sukhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n3:115_6: Tepi hi na sabbassa ekaṁsato byabhicārino eva.
anya-e0103n3:115_8: ‘‘Asukañca asukañca manasikāravidhiṁ katipayadivasaṁ anuyuñjāhī’’ti ca vattabbo.
anya-e0103n3:116_1: tattha sajjhāyavasena vā manasikāravasena vā kataparicayaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:116_2: Ekaṁ dve nisajjānīti ekaṁ vā dve vā uṇhāsanāni.
anya-e0103n3:116_3: Sajjhāyaṁ kāretvā attano sammukhāva adhīyāpetvā dātabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n3:116_5: Tenāha ‘‘santike vasantassā’’ti. Āgatāgatakkhaṇe kathetabbaṁ, pavattiṁ sutvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n3:117_1: Taṁ taṁ ākāranti ācariyena kammaṭṭhāne vuccamāne padapadatthādhippāyaopammādikaṁ attano ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhitaṁ taṁ taṁ ākāraṁ, yaṁ yaṁ nimittanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n3:117_4: Evaṁ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitassatitāya nimittaṁ gahetvā tattha sampajānakāritāya sakkaccaṁ suṇantena.
anya-e0103n3:117_7: Sabbākārenāti kassacipi pakārassa tattha asesitattā vuttaṁ.
